Context: To accept an offer from George Brown College, visitors should go to ontariocolleges.ca and log in with their OCAS username and password. They can also call the Ontario Colleges Application Service at 1-888-892-2228. International students should use the International Application portal. Offer responses are required by the expiry date noted on the offer. George Brown College emphasizes experiential learning and prepares students for employment by incorporating practical knowledge and skills in many programs. For assistance, contact the George Brown College Contact Centre at 416-415-2000 or email ask.george@georgebrown.ca. Once an offer is accepted, there are next steps to follow, such as learning about land acknowledgment and staying updated on application deadlines, college news, and events by signing up for updates. The contact information for the George Brown College Contact Centre includes a phone number (416-415-2000) and an email address (ask.george@georgebrown.ca). The website's content is subject to change without notice.
